resources.string: To get started, ensure your server is on the same local network and enter the servers IP Address above.

This project was developed by USF Computer Engineering students as part of the Capstone course. CARRTs vision is to be a leader in global collaborative research, education and service for improving the quality of life of individuals with impairments and functional limitations due to aging and disability. Special thanks to Dr. Redwan Alqsemi, Dr. Ken Christensen, and Kyle Ashley.
